mapper.insert: INSERT INTO friend(id, friend_id, content) VALUES(#{id}, #{friendId}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT f.no, f.id, f.friend_id as friendId, m.name as friendName,f.content, date_format(f.reg_date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') as regDate, f.agree_flag as agreeFlag FROM friend f LEFT JOIN member m ON f.friend_id = m.id WHERE f.id = #{id}
